attributeDefinitionId.description: index in [layer.attributeSetDefinitions](layer.md) array. Must be `null` (or omit) if mesh as no attributes

resourceId.description: resource locator to be used to query texture and geometry resources `layers/0/nodes/{this.resourceId}/...` **IMPORTANT**: unrelated to `node.index`!

texelCountHint.description: Estimated number of texel for the highest resolution base color texture. i.e. `texture.mip0.width*texture.mip0.height`. Useful to estimate the resource cost of this node and/or texel-resolution based LOD switching. Ignored for un-textured meshes

vertexCount.description: Number of vertices in the geometry buffer of this mesh

featureCount.description: Number of features for this mesh (must omit or set to `0` if mesh doesn't use `features`)

examples.title: Simple un-textured mesh without  any attributes nor feature and using `geometryDefinitionSet[0]`
